DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study recruitment healthy volunteer consecutive recipient H1N1 influenza vaccine University Clinic Respiratory Allergic Diseases , Golnik , Slovenia . The purpose study evaluate certain safety aspect adjuvanted influenza H1N1 vaccine .
DOC.criteria: Recipients H1N1 influenza vaccine . Healthy individual sign influenza infectious disease . Signs influenza infectious disease 1 month study participation .
